name: nyoomchester
description:
nyoomchester is a game about moving fast, very fast.

The aim is to get to the end within a rapid time, the slower you are the worse you are doing. Standing still is never a good idea as it will generally lead to your death. m Movement is primary everything else falls away, you just cant stop moving. There are a number of challenges built of a variety of mechanics, including but not limited to rocket launchers, falling blocks you need to grapple to and high speed manoeuvres

You have a number of ways of moving, you should generally use the fastest one you can.

you have:

  • The classic movement keys to run around and jump, though they are fast, they are inefficient. 
  • a high speed grappling hook, capable of pulling both you and certain objects towards you.
  • Various objects in the level to propel you in certain directions at incredible speed.

You must use these to complete the levels with upmost efficiency.

This game was made by two first years, crypticCoder and ogelbw, under the team mJed for the UniCS2021 Game Jam with the theme "You cant stop"

We hope you like it :)
